content.en: Algorithmic Insurance: Researchers have developed various algorithms to address different research questions in the field of insurance ratemaking. These algorithms include approximate Gibbs sampling, Metropolis-Hastings algorithm, EM algorithm-based procedure, maximum likelihood and restricted maximum likelihood algorithms, expectation conditional maximization (ECM) algorithm, and expectation-maximization (EM) type algorithm. These algorithms are used to estimate event rates, model insurance claims, estimate parameters of different distributions, and fit regression models to data.
content.da: Algoritmisk forsikring: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at håndtere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for området forsikringsprissætning. Disse algoritmer inkluderer approksimativ Gibbs-sampling, Metropolis-Hastings algoritme, EM-algoritmebaseret procedure, maksimal sandsynlighed og begrænset maksimal sandsynlighed algoritmer, expectation conditional maximization (ECM) algoritme og expectation-maximization (EM) type algoritme. Disse algoritmer bruges til at estimere hændelsesrater, modellere forsikringskrav, estimere parametre for forskellige fordelinger og tilpasse regressionsmodeller til data.
